name: adk-client-demos
description: Demo implementations for ADK Client Web Component integration methods - completely standalone examples

scripts.serve:method1: cd method-1-local && npm install && npm run serve
scripts.dev:method3: cd method-3-react && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:method1 && npm run setup:method3
scripts.start:all: npm run serve:method1 & npm run serve:method2 & npm run dev:method3 & npm run serve:method4

author: ADK Client Team
